channel.title: Comments on: The Songs of Summer

item.title: By: Arthur
item.dc:creator: Arthur
item.description: Hey K! Teddy Thompson is the son of Richard and Linda Thompson. NPR's The World had a great profile of Vampire Weekend, describing their unique musical style and its African influence.
item.content:encoded:
Hey K!
Teddy Thompson is the son of Richard and Linda Thompson.
NPR’s The World had a great profile of Vampire Weekend, describing their unique musical style and its African influence.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Hey Arthur! I've never heard of Teddy Thompson. I'll have to check him out. That entire Vampire Weekend album really is a great one for a chill summer's evening.
item.content:encoded:
Hey Arthur!
I’ve never heard of Teddy Thompson. I’ll have to check him out. That entire Vampire Weekend album really is a great one for a chill summer’s evening.

item.title: By: Arthur
item.dc:creator: Arthur
item.content:encoded:
Teddy Thompson — “In My Arms”
Martha Wainwright — “You Cheated Me”
Okkervil River “Calling and Not Calling My Ex”
Vampire Weekend “Cape Cod Kwassa Kwassa”
